attributes.comment:
I understand that fee increases are necessary and expected. I am an adoptive
parent that has been more than willing to pay the fees necessary to ensure a
successful adoption. I was recently informed that my adoption timeline has been
extended as much as 12 months. The fact that, I will have to redo all the federal
requirements, in addition to paying - again, the extensive fees, makes the
proposed fee increase a financial burden that, will cause an additional extension
on my already extended timeline for having my child home. Please consider the
emotional and financial toll this proposed increase has on thousands of lives.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Juliann Curraba
